details.name: Designing an MLSAVA RF Antenna
points: Designed Modified Leaf Shaped Antipodal Vivaldi Antenna on Ansys Electronics Desktop.
Sensitive from 1 GHz to 12.2 GHz frequency.

details.name: Developing 16-bit CPU with 8-bit ALU
points: Made the 16-bit CPU which can perform all basic cpu operations.
Added 8-bit ALU system in CPU for mathematical operations.
Also implemented the program counter for storing the next process's addresses.
